Brendy's Gay Little Game is a retro PC era adventure platformer game starring a Rabbit Gal named Brendy who's trying to collect pieces of her girlfriend Dee to reform her.

to beat the game you have to find every piece of drip and then find an exit to bring Dee back.

============

= Controls =

============

Climb ladders using Up and Down

Move using Left and Right

press an Action button like Z or Space to jump

Gamepads are supported

=====================

= ITEMS & OBSTACLES =

=====================

Key - Collect all of these on a screen to unlock locked doors

Locked Door - These doors will remain blocking your path until you get all the keys

Door - these doors will bring you to another door either above or below the current screen

Ladders - You can climb up and down these, holding up while jumping on to one will let you catch on to them too

Drip - Dee's drops, collect them all to unlock exit doors

Exit door - A Door with a circle in the middle, won't open unless all drips are collected

Lives - Collect these to get more lives

Mooka - These little guys are scattered throuhout the place, they'll run around and try to catch you, you can easily jump over them but be careful their movements can be pretty tricky

Spikes - These spikes will defeat Brendy the moment she touches them, they can either be stationary or bounce around the room

=====================

= Gameplay and Tips =

=====================

Brendy snaps along on a grid, she won't fall until she stops moving so use that to try and get the most out of your jumps

Ceilings won't affect your jump time, you'll still get enough space to jump over gaps even with a pit beneath you
